name: Rou Grapple
description:
Play as Rou the cat and bounce around using the grapple gun in this 2D GameBoy inspired Platformer.

Shoot your grapple gun downwards into flower buds to bust them open and collect their pollen. Collect as much pollen as you can to get the highest score whilst searching for 'The Giant Acorn'.

All music and sound effects made using LovelyComposer <3
